title: Russian Comedian Accused of Making a Joke About Veterans Gets Prison Time
summary_full: The comedian, Artemy Ostanin, was convicted of “inciting hatred” by making a joke during a stand-up routine in March.
summary_public: The comedian, Artemy Ostanin, was convicted of “inciting hatred” by making a joke during a stand-up routine in March.
